summary: This is an automated email notification from a travel system (E2Solutions) sent to a traveler regarding a late travel voucher. The trip was for witness interviews related to the case 'U.S. v. Epstein' and took place in Santa Monica in September 2019.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case 'U.S. v. Epstein' for which the traveler was conducting witness interviews.

events.title: Witness Interview Trip to Santa Monica
events.description: A trip was taken to Santa Monica for the purpose of conducting witness interviews for the case U.S. v. Epstein.

events.title: Late Travel Voucher Notification
events.description: An automated email was sent notifying a traveler that their voucher for a trip related to the Epstein case was overdue.

keyFacts: The document is a travel system notification regarding a late expense voucher.
The associated trip (ID: 10643456-2) was for 'U.S. v. Epstein - Witness Interviews'.
The trip destination was Santa Monica and occurred from September 17 to September 20, 2019.
The document indicates ongoing investigative activity (witness interviews) in the Epstein case as of September 2019.
The notification was sent from a Department of Justice travel system (E2Solutions), suggesting the traveler was a government employee or contractor.
